ComicInfo.Title: Apocalypse Shortly
ComicInfo.Summary: Uncle Frankie tells Jackie about his father. Jackie makes a teal with The Angelus.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:36:30. [CVDB43766]
ComicInfo.Inker: Jeff de los Santos, Jose Guillen, Marcia Chen, Matt Banning, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Marc Silvestri, Matt Banning, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.Characters: Angelus's Familiar, Danny Estacado, Darkus, Frankie Franchetti, Jackie Estacado, Jenny Romano, Sonatine, The Angelus, Wenders
ComicInfo.Teams: Angelus Warriors, Darklings, The Brotherhood Of Darkness, The Franchetti Family
ComicInfo.Locations: Long Island, New York City, New York State, Statue of Liberty
